project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a Python-based quiz game that asks multiple-choice questions, keeps track of the user's score, and displays the final score at the end of the game.

task.name: Implement core game functionality that includes asking questions and receiving user input.
Store questions and answers in a variable within the code.
Implement scoring system to track user's correct answers.
Display the final score at the end of the game.
Write tests for the game functionality to ensure it works correctly.
Execute tests on the implemented game features to ensure that they function correctly.
